document_data.caption: A map showing the Lions and surroundings in the Sea Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: The Lions
document_data.mainbody: '''The Lions''' was a small road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: The Lions was located in the southwest section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]]. The Lions branched off of [[Diamond Street]] just east of that road's intersection with [[Westwall Street]]. It passed southeast through the Sea Ward, terminating at [[Julthoon Street]] after passing the [[Field of Triumph]] where it formed its eastern border. Other roads connecting with the Lions included [[Dob's Loss]], [[Gulzindar Street]], [[Seawatch Street]], and [[Jelzar's Stride]].
